Sergio Marchionne , CEO of both Chrysler and Fiat, said the Fiat 500 doesn't have ambitions to conquer the U.S. market. It was designed for select areas. Volumes are small. Of 120,000 units to be built annually at Chrysler's Toluca, Mexico, plant, half are for North America and the rest are bound for Brazil and China. The

NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said. "He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations." Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.

Social Security supporters are adamant that the program will be repaid, just as the U.S. government repays others who invest in U.S. Treasury bonds. It's an IOU that is backed by Treasury bonds and the faith and credit of the United States government, said Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt.
